welcomeMsg: Welcome to the Live Oak Bank Customer Portal
story1Title: A few things to know before you get started
bonus1Body: Most small business loan applications can take up to 4 weeks to process? Live Oak Bank does it in two days. How do we accomplish this magnificent feat? The answer may surprise you!
